comments.author: berestnev@gmail.com
comments.text:
User-Agent:       Mozilla/5.0 (Windows; U; Windows NT 6.1; en-US) AppleWebKit/534.16 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/10.0.648.204 Safari/534.16
Build Identifier: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 6.1; WOW64; rv:2.0) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/4.0

The issue isn't reproducible on all PCs. Unfortunately, we can't determinate the difference.

We've tested 8 PCs:
4 32-bit Windows 7 - can't reproduce
3 64-bit Windows 7 - reproduced
1 64-bit Windows 7 - can't reproduce

Reproducible: Always

Steps to Reproduce:
<input id="testInput" type="text" value="test" style="border: 1px solid Black; padding: 0; font-family: Tahoma; font-size: 10px;" />
<script type"text/javascript">
    alert(document.getElementById("testInput").offsetHeight);
</script>
Actual Results:  
16

Expected Results:  
14
